attributes.action: Actively Assist with the Return of Madeleine McCann to her Family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the Prime Minister to make his presence known in Europe now (particularly Portugal and Spain) and show the same support that the nation has shown to help finding Madeleine. We urge him to use his contacts of the highest level to do all that is possible to help maintain and add to the media and investigatory campaign. God bless her and her family.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
